info.official_title: Phase II Randomized Study of Abiraterone Acetate Plus ADT Versus APALUTAMIDE Versus Abiraterone and APALUTAMIDE in Patients With Advanced Prostate Cancer With Non-castrate Testosterone Levels

identified_line.line: 1. Histologically confirmed prostate adenocarcinoma;
2. Hormone naïve patients with indication to ADT in the following settings:
* Advanced loco-regional disease not amenable to curative local therapy (surgery or radiotherapy): T category T3/4 or node positive

criterions.exact_snippets: Advanced loco-regional disease not amenable to curative local therapy (surgery or radiotherapy)

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Advanced loco-regional disease not amenable to curative local therapy (surgery or radiotherapy)

identified_line.line: * Biochemical relapse after primary treatment (surgery or radiotherapy): patients in whom primary therapy is not appropriate or feasible with Previously treated with radical surgery and/or radiotherapy, now relapsing with at least one of the criteria: PSA >= 4 ng/ml and rising with doubling time less than 10 months. or PSA >= 20 ng/ml or N+ or M+

criterions.exact_snippets: Biochemical relapse after primary treatment (surgery or radiotherapy)
primary therapy is not appropriate or feasible
Previously treated with radical surgery and/or radiotherapy
PSA >= 4 ng/ml and rising with doubling time less than 10 months
PSA >= 4 ng/ml and rising with doubling time less than 10 months
PSA >= 4 ng/ml and rising with doubling time less than 10 months

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Biochemical relapse after primary treatment (surgery or radiotherapy)
primary therapy is not appropriate or feasible
Previously treated with radical surgery and/or radiotherapy
PSA >= 4 ng/ml and rising with doubling time less than 10 months
PSA >= 4 ng/ml and rising with doubling time less than 10 months
PSA >= 4 ng/ml and rising with doubling time less than 10 months

identified_line.line: * Newly diagnosed metastatic disease: Tany Nany M+
4. Non-castration level of testosterone > 230ng/dL (> 8 nmol/L);
5. Baseline level of prostatespecific antigen (PSA) > 2ng/dL;
6. ECOG performance status of 0 to 2;
7. Adequate hematologic, hepatic and renal function:
1. hemoglobin > 10 g/dL, neutrophils > 1.5×109 / L, platelets> 100×109 / L;
2. total bilirubin < 1.5x upper limit of normal (ULN); alanine (ALT) and aspartate (AST) aminotransferase < 2.5 x ULN;

criterions.exact_snippets: total bilirubin < 1.5x upper limit of normal (ULN)
alanine (ALT) and aspartate (AST) aminotransferase < 2.5 x ULN
alanine (ALT) and aspartate (AST) aminotransferase < 2.5 x ULN

and_criteria.exact_snippets: total bilirubin < 1.5x upper limit of normal (ULN)
alanine (ALT) and aspartate (AST) aminotransferase < 2.5 x ULN
alanine (ALT) and aspartate (AST) aminotransferase < 2.5 x ULN

identified_line.line: 3. serum creatinine < 1.5x ULN; potassium > 3.5 mM;
8. No previous cancer (except treated basal-cell skin cancer);

criterions.exact_snippets: No previous cancer (except treated basal-cell skin cancer)

not_criteria.exact_snippets: No previous cancer (except treated basal-cell skin cancer)

identified_line.line: 9. Written informed consent obtained prior to any study procedure;
10. Men age 18 years and older;

11. Agrees to use a condom and another effective method of birth control if he is having sex with a woman of childbearing potential or agrees to use a condom if he is having sex with a woman who is pregnant.

criterions.exact_snippets: Agrees to use a condom and another effective method of birth control if he is having sex with a woman of childbearing potential
criterions.criterion: birth control method for sex with a woman of childbearing potential

criterions.exact_snippets: agrees to use a condom if he is having sex with a woman who is pregnant
criterions.criterion: birth control method for sex with a pregnant woman

condition.exact_snippets: Agrees to use a condom and another effective method of birth control if he is having sex with a woman of childbearing potential
condition.criterion: birth control method for sex with a woman of childbearing potential

condition.exact_snippets: agrees to use a condom if he is having sex with a woman who is pregnant
condition.criterion: birth control method for sex with a pregnant woman

identified_line.line: Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be MALE
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
1. Prostate adenocarcinoma with neuroendocrine differentiation or small cell histology;
2. Biochemical recurrence without evidence of clinical or radiological disease;

criterions.exact_snippets: without evidence of clinical or radiological disease

and_criteria.exact_snippets: without evidence of clinical or radiological disease

identified_line.line: 3. Use of hormonal therapy or chemotherapy prior to randomization. Exception is courses of hormone therapy for localised disease must have been completed at least 12 months previously. It can have been given as adjuvant or neoadjuvant therapy.

criterions.exact_snippets: Use of hormonal therapy or chemotherapy prior to randomization.
courses of hormone therapy for localised disease must have been completed at least 12 months previously.

condition.exact_snippets: Use of hormonal therapy or chemotherapy prior to randomization.

or_criteria.exact_snippets: courses of hormone therapy for localised disease must have been completed at least 12 months previously.
Use of hormonal therapy or chemotherapy prior to randomization.

identified_line.line: 4. Prior radiation therapy for a primary tumour within the 3 months before enrollment or for the treatment of metastases;

criterions.exact_snippets: Prior radiation therapy for a primary tumour within the 3 months before enrollment
criterions.criterion: prior radiation therapy for a primary tumour

criterions.exact_snippets: Prior radiation therapy ... for the treatment of metastases

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Prior radiation therapy for a primary tumour within the 3 months before enrollment
and_criteria.criterion: prior radiation therapy for a primary tumour

or_criteria.exact_snippets: Prior radiation therapy ... for the treatment of metastases

identified_line.line: 5. Known or suspected brain or skull metastases or leptomeningeal metastatic disease;

criterions.exact_snippets: Known or suspected brain or skull metastases

or_criteria.exact_snippets: Known or suspected brain or skull metastases

identified_line.line: 6. Any concurrent severe and/or uncontrolled medical conditions which could compromise participation in the study;

criterions.exact_snippets: concurrent severe and/or uncontrolled medical conditions
concurrent severe and/or uncontrolled medical conditions

or_criteria.exact_snippets: concurrent severe and/or uncontrolled medical conditions
concurrent severe and/or uncontrolled medical conditions

identified_line.line: 7. Administration of an investigational therapeutic or invasive surgical procedure (not including surgical castration) within 28 days of Cycle 1 Day 1 or currently enrolled in an investigational study;

criterions.exact_snippets: Administration of an investigational therapeutic ... within 28 days of Cycle 1 Day 1
invasive surgical procedure (not including surgical castration) within 28 days of Cycle 1 Day 1
currently enrolled in an investigational study

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Administration of an investigational therapeutic ... within 28 days of Cycle 1 Day 1
invasive surgical procedure (not including surgical castration) within 28 days of Cycle 1 Day 1

or_criteria.exact_snippets: currently enrolled in an investigational study

identified_line.line: 8. Active or symptomatic viral hepatitis or chronic liver disease; ascites or bleeding disorders secondary to hepatic dysfunction;

criterions.exact_snippets: bleeding disorders secondary to hepatic dysfunction
criterions.criterion: bleeding disorders secondary to hepatic dysfunction

or_criteria.exact_snippets: bleeding disorders secondary to hepatic dysfunction
or_criteria.criterion: bleeding disorders secondary to hepatic dysfunction

identified_line.line: 9. Current or prior treatment with anti-epileptic medications for the treatment of seizures;

criterions.exact_snippets: Current or prior treatment with anti-epileptic medications for the treatment of seizures

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Current or prior treatment with anti-epileptic medications for the treatment of seizures

identified_line.line: 10. Impaired cardiac function, including any of the following:
1. Uncontrolled hypertension (systolic blood pressure ≥160 mmHg or diastolic BP ≥95 mmHg);

2. Clinically significant heart disease as evidenced by myocardial infarction, or arterial thrombotic events or history of cardiac failure in the past 6 months, severe or unstable angina, or New York Heart Association (NYHA) Class II-IV heart disease;

criterions.exact_snippets: Clinically significant heart disease as evidenced by myocardial infarction
Clinically significant heart disease as evidenced by ... arterial thrombotic events
Clinically significant heart disease as evidenced by ... history of cardiac failure in the past 6 months
Clinically significant heart disease as evidenced by ... severe or unstable angina
Clinically significant heart disease as evidenced by ... New York Heart Association (NYHA) Class II-IV heart disease
criterions.criterion: New York Heart Association (NYHA) Class II-IV heart disease

or_criteria.exact_snippets: Clinically significant heart disease as evidenced by myocardial infarction
Clinically significant heart disease as evidenced by ... arterial thrombotic events
Clinically significant heart disease as evidenced by ... history of cardiac failure in the past 6 months
Clinically significant heart disease as evidenced by ... severe or unstable angina
Clinically significant heart disease as evidenced by ... New York Heart Association (NYHA) Class II-IV heart disease
or_criteria.criterion: New York Heart Association (NYHA) Class II-IV heart disease

identified_line.line: 3. Existing atrial fibrillation with or without pharmacotherapy. Other cardiac arrhythmia requiring pharmacotherapy;

4. History of seizure or condition that may predispose to seizure (including, but not limited to prior stroke, transient ischemic attack or loss of consciousness ≤1 year prior to randomization; brain arteriovenous malformation; or intracranial masses such as schwannomas and meningiomas that are causing edema or mass effect);

criterions.exact_snippets: condition that may predispose to seizure
loss of consciousness ≤1 year prior to randomization
intracranial masses such as schwannomas and meningiomas

and_criteria.exact_snippets: condition that may predispose to seizure
loss of consciousness ≤1 year prior to randomization
intracranial masses such as schwannomas and meningiomas

identified_line.line: 11. Specific underlying conditions for oral agents. For example: impairment of gastrointestinal (GI) function or GI disease that may significantly alter the absorption of abiraterone or APALUTAMIDE (e.g., ulcerative diseases, uncontrolled nausea, vomiting, diarrhea, malabsorption syndrome, or small bowel resection)

criterions.exact_snippets: impairment of gastrointestinal (GI) function or GI disease

and_criteria.exact_snippets: impairment of gastrointestinal (GI) function or GI disease

identified_line.line: 12. General excluded medications (e.g., relevant to cytochrome P450 interactions)

criterions.exact_snippets: General excluded medications (e.g., relevant to cytochrome P450 interactions)

not_criteria.exact_snippets: General excluded medications (e.g., relevant to cytochrome P450 interactions)

identified_line.line: 3. G-CSF, GM-CSF, erythropoietin, etc;
4. Coumadin;
5. Drugs which may cause QT prolongation;

criterions.exact_snippets: Drugs which may cause QT prolongation

not_criteria.exact_snippets: Drugs which may cause QT prolongation

identified_line.line: 6. Known sensitivity to drugs or metabolites from similar classes;

criterions.exact_snippets: Known sensitivity to drugs or metabolites from similar classes

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Known sensitivity to drugs or metabolites from similar classes

identified_line.line: 7. Known or suspected contraindications or hypersensitivity to APALUTAMIDE, bicalutamide or GnRH agonists or any of the components of the formulations;

contraindications ... to ... any of the components of the formulations

criterions.exact_snippets: hypersensitivity to ... any of the components of the formulations

contraindications ... to ... any of the components of the formulations

and_criteria.criterion: hypersensitivity to any of the components of the formulations

identified_line.line: 13. Any condition or situation which, in the opinion of the investigator, would put the subject at risk, may confound study results, or interfere with the subject's participation in this study.

Any condition or situation ... may confound study results
Any condition or situation ... interfere with the subject's participation

Any condition or situation ... interfere with the subject's participation

identified_line.line: 1. Use of prescription drugs within 14 days prior to dosing or over-the-counter (OTC) medication within 7 days prior to dosing;

use of ... over-the-counter (OTC) medication within 7 days prior to dosing

or_criteria.exact_snippets: Use of prescription drugs within 14 days prior to dosing
use of ... over-the-counter (OTC) medication within 7 days prior to dosing

identified_line.line: 3. Patient is asymptomatic or moderately symptomatic regarding bone symptoms, i.e., no need for palliative radiation or radionuclide therapy;

criterions.exact_snippets: Patient is asymptomatic or moderately symptomatic regarding bone symptoms
no need for palliative radiation or radionuclide therapy
criterions.criterion: need for palliative radiation or radionuclide therapy

identified_line.line: 2. Consumption of grapefruit product or St John's wort within 7 days prior to dosing;
